_sText:
Player controlled searchlight made by me, by request for Arkaney

Simply press e behind it to activate then use w,a,s,d to control moves left right up down etc.. fully rotating, if you want right click turns it off left back on again.

Shoot the glass for 100 hp (can be changed) will disable it and turn the light off.

I couldn't work out how to change the intensity of the light, but if you know then just do that if it needs to be brighter.

use if you want, but if you place more than one in a map you need to change the entity names, pm or steam me if you need help with that.


Jon
